name: Car Factory Simulator
summary:
Especially for fans of economic strategies, we made this game. An automobile factory is at your disposal. To be precise, you start with an empty factory and you will have to build it already.
It will be necessary to start with the installation of the first workshops - stamping and welding, where body parts will be manufactured. Next, the body will need to be assembled and painted. By the way, you can also choose the color of the car yourself.
At the same time, you will have to adjust the release of the suspension, as well as the motor. After that, in a special workshop, combine these components.
Next, you will need to install the seats and dashboard and check the build quality. That's all this and much more, the players will have to organize in their car factory.
We have been working on this game for a very long time and tried to do everything so that you like it.
We will gladly respond to your feedback and wishes. The game is constantly evolving and improving, including thanks to our players.
